pages.text: The Dark Forest (aka Roofed Forest or Dark Oak Forest) and its hill variant are the main natural source of $(l:world/tree)dark oak wood$(). If you have $(l:enchantments/silk_touch)silk touch$(), you will also find a lot of giant $(l:blocks/mushroom)mushrooms$() to mine.$(br2)The usual monsters and animals spawn here. Structures available include $(l:structures/village)villages$(), $(l:structures/outpost)outposts$(), $(l:structures/outpost)mansions$() and $(l:structures/witch_hut)witch huts$().
The dark forest is generally considered more dangerous than other biomes, due to the fact that monsters can stay there the whole day, because the leaves prevent them from burning.
